title: GOOD FAITH AND INTERNATIONAL ECONOMIC LAW
description: Author: M Sornarajah Edition: 1 edition Publication Date: July 14, 2015 Publisher: Oxford University Press ISBN-10: 0198739796 ISBN-13: 978-0198739791 Pages: 224 pages Format: pdf Size: 2.0M --- The past two decades have seen a significant proliferation of trade and investment treaties around the world. States are increasingly negotiating agreements that regulate both trade and investment, such as the Trans-Pacific Partnership Agreement and the Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership. The number of investor-state dispute settlement cases is growing dramatically each year, yet states` enthusiasm for investor-state arbitration has become more qualified as concern has intensified that the system can be abused by foreign investors. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/good-faith-and-international-economic-law-international-economic-law-series/

parsed.dn: GOOD FAITH AND INTERNATIONAL ECONOMIC LAW
parsed.name: GOOD FAITH AND INTERNATIONAL ECONOMIC LAW
